Control: Maintain devices to ensure integrity and availability
Enable physical protection against tampering and reverse engineering
Check to ensure that any sensitive data and licensed software has been removed or securely overwritten prior to disposal.
All communications port(s) -  such as USB -  RS232 etc. -  which are not used as part of the product_ normal operation are not physically accessible or are disabled.
Apply physical protection measures against environmental threats
Apply physical access controls to prevent unauthorized access to IoT devices
Mandate permission prior to taking devices off-site or moving devices between locations
